Package com.b2international.commons.config

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigurationSourceProvider
    Capable of opening configuration sources.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    Abstract base configuration class to use for application configuration.
    ConfigurationFactory<T>
    A factory class for loading JSON and YAML configuration files, binding them to configuration objects.
    FileConfigurationSourceProvider
    Capable of opening file based configurations located in the local file system.
    URLConfigurationSourceProvider
    An implementation of ConfigurationSourceProvider that reads the configuration from a URL.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationValidationException
